mapper.select: SELECT payment_code, member_code, payment_date, payment_method, payment_amount, payment_status from tbl_payment where member_code = #{memberCode} ORDER BY payment_code DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_payment (member_code, payment_date, payment_method, payment_amount, payment_status, merchant_uid, imp_uid) VALUES (#{memberCode}, NOW(), #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentAmount}, #{paymentStatus}, #{merchantUid}, #{impUid})
mapper.select: SELECT reservation_code FROM tbl_reservation_payment WHERE payment_code = #{paymentCode}
